mapper.insert: insert into tb_group (group_id,chain_id,genesis_block_hash,node_count,create_time,modify_time) values(#{groupId},#{chainId},#{genesisBlockHash},#{nodeCount},NOW(),NOW()) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE genesis_block_hash=#{genesisBlockHash},node_count=#{nodeCount},modify_time=NOW()

insert into tb_group (group_id,chain_id,app_name,app_version,app_summary,description,create_time,modify_time) values
(#{info.groupId},#{info.chainId},#{info.appName},#{info.appVersion},#{info.appSummary},#{info.description},NOW(),NOW())
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE app_name=VALUES(app_name),app_version=VALUES(app_version),app_summary=VALUES(app_summary),description=VALUES(description),modify_time=NOW()
mapper.update: update tb_group set app_name = #{appName}, app_version = #{appVersion}, app_summary = #{appSummary}, description = #{description}, modify_time = now() where group_id = #{groupId} and chain_id = #{chainId}
mapper.select: SELECT a.chain_id chainId, a.group_id groupId, a.node_count nodeCount, count(distinct(b.user_address)) userCount, count(distinct(b.contract_address)) contractCount FROM tb_group a, tb_parser_#{chainId}_#{groupId} b WHERE a.chain_id = #{chainId} AND a.group_id = #{groupId}
